content_old: 8 The next day the Philistines came to strip the slain, and they found Saul and his three sons lying on Mount Gilboa.

content: 9 They cut off his head and stripped him of his armor, and they sent them throughout the land of the Philistines, to spread the news in the temples of their idols and among the people.

content: 10 They placed his armor in the temple of Ashtaroth, and they impaled his body on the wall of Beth-shan.
content_old: 10 They placed his armor in the temple of Ashtaroth, and they impaled his body on the wall of Beth-shan.

content: 11 When the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead heard about it—what the Philistines had done to Saul—
content_old: 11 When the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead heard about it—what the Philistines had done to Saul—

content: 12 all their stalwart men set out and marched all night; they removed the bodies of Saul and his sons from the wall of Beth-shan and came to Jabesh and burned them there.
